articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
My name is Richard Vogg. I am a mathematician from TU Kaiserslautern in German, where I focused on statistics and obtained a Masterâ€™s degree.
Using R makes me happy. Sometimes I learn interesting things that might be interesting for others. I created this blog to share them.
